com.communote.server.core.user

Interface UserGroupManagement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserGroupManagementBase, UserGroupManagementImpl

    public interface UserGroupManagement

    Manage an user group.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Long createExternalGroup(ExternalGroupVO groupVO)
      Create a group imported from an external system.
      Group createGroup(GroupVO groupVO)
      Create a new group.
      Long createOrUpdateExternalGroup(ExternalGroupVO groupVO)
      Create a group imported from an external system or if that group already exists it is updated.
      void deleteExternalGroup(Long groupId, String externalSystemId)
      Delete an external group.
      void deleteGroup(Long groupId)
      Delete a group.
      <T> T findGroupByAlias(String alias, Converter<Group,T> converter)
      Find a user group by its alias and convert it to the object to be returned.
      <T> T findGroupById(Long id, Converter<Group,T> converter)
      Find a user group by its ID and convert it to the object to be returned.
      boolean isExternalGroup(Long groupId)
      Test whether a group is an external group or an internal group.

      Update a group that was imported from an external system.
      void updateGroup(Long groupId, GroupVO groupVO)
      Update an existing group.

    • Method Detail

      • createExternalGroup

        Long createExternalGroup(ExternalGroupVO groupVO)
                  throws AliasValidationException,
                         AliasAlreadyExistsException,
                         GroupAlreadyExistsException

        Create a group imported from an external system.

        Parameters:
        groupVO - a value object with details about the group. If the alias member is not set it will be generated from the name.
        Returns:
        the ID of the created group
        Throws:
        AliasValidationException - in case the alias field is not valid
        AliasAlreadyExistsException - in case the alias already exists
        GroupAlreadyExistsException - in case there is already a local group for the external group

      • createGroup

        Group createGroup(GroupVO groupVO)
           throws AliasAlreadyExistsException,
                  AliasValidationException,
                  AuthorizationException
        Create a new group.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the client manager or the internal system user
        AliasAlreadyExistsException
        AliasValidationException

      • createOrUpdateExternalGroup

        Long createOrUpdateExternalGroup(ExternalGroupVO groupVO)
                          throws AliasValidationException,
                                 AliasAlreadyExistsException

        Create a group imported from an external system or if that group already exists it is updated.

        Parameters:
        groupVO - a value object with details about the group. If the alias member is not set it will be generated from the name.
        Returns:
        the ID of the created group
        Throws:
        AliasValidationException - in case the alias field is not valid
        AliasAlreadyExistsException - in case the alias already exists

      • deleteExternalGroup

        void deleteExternalGroup(Long groupId,
                         String externalSystemId)
                  throws AuthorizationException
        Delete an external group. If the group does not exist nothing will happen.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user

      • deleteGroup

        void deleteGroup(Long groupId)
          throws GroupOperationNotPermittedException,
                 AuthorizationException
        Delete a group. The group members are note deleted.
        Parameters:
        groupId - the Id of the group to delete
        Throws:
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException - if the group refers to an external group
        AuthorizationException - if the current user is not client manager

      • findGroupByAlias

        <T> T findGroupByAlias(String alias,
                       Converter<Group,T> converter)
        Find a user group by its alias and convert it to the object to be returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the target object
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias of the group to retrieve
        converter - the converter to create the target object
        Returns:
        the found group as an instance of the target type or null if the group wasn't found

      • findGroupById

        <T> T findGroupById(Long id,
                    Converter<Group,T> converter)
        Find a user group by its ID and convert it to the object to be returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the target object
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the group to retrieve
        converter - the converter to create the target object
        Returns:
        the found group as an instance of the target type or null if the group wasn't found

      • isExternalGroup

        boolean isExternalGroup(Long groupId)
        Test whether a group is an external group or an internal group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to test
        Returns:
        true if the group exists and is an external group, false otherwise

      • updateExternalGroup

        void updateExternalGroup(Long groupId,
                         ExternalGroupVO groupVO)
                  throws GroupNotFoundException
        Update a group that was imported from an external system. The alias won't be changed.
        Parameters:
        groupId - ID of the group to update
        groupVO - a value object with details about the group
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group to update does not exist

      • updateGroup

        void updateGroup(Long groupId,
                 GroupVO groupVO)
          throws GroupNotFoundException,
                 GroupOperationNotPermittedException

        Update an existing group. The alias won't be changed.

        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group to update
        groupVO - a value object with details about the group
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group to update does not exist
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group is an external group
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException
